casebody.data:
NATIONSTAR MORTGAGE, LLC
v.
Annette L. WASHINGTON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 23, 2018 Annette L. Washington, self-represented, and Basil Washington, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The petition by the defendant Annette L. Washington and the intervening defendant Basil Washington for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 41309) is denied.
